CustomField.description: Optional. The text version of the email, specified by the sender. You must specify a value for setTemplateId, setHtmlBody, or setPlainTextBody. Or, you can define both setHtmlBody and setPlainTextBody.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Optional. The text version of the email, specified by the sender. You must specify a value for setTemplateId, setHtmlBody, or setPlainTextBody. Or, you can define both setHtmlBody and setPlainTextBody.
CustomField.label: PlainTextBody
